Definitions of Managed Objects for the NBMA Next Hop Resolution Protocol (NHRP)
contents.zh-CHS: NBMA下一跳解析协议（NHRP）的托管对象定义

contents.text: Status of this Memo
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录的状况

contents.text: This document specifies an Internet standards track protocol for the Internet community, and requests discussion and suggestions for improvements. Please refer to the current edition of the "Internet Official Protocol Standards" (STD 1) for the standardization state and status of this protocol. Distribution of this memo is unlimited.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件规定了互联网社区的互联网标准跟踪协议，并要求进行讨论和提出改进建议。有关本协议的标准化状态和状态，请参考当前版本的“互联网官方协议标准”（STD 1）。本备忘录的分发不受限制。

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, it describes managed objects for the Next Hop Resolution Protocol (NHRP) as defined in RFC 2332.
contents.zh-CHS: 此备忘录定义了管理信息库（MIB）的一部分，用于Internet社区中的网络管理协议。特别是，它描述了RFC 2332中定义的下一跳解析协议（NHRP）的托管对象。

contents.text: Table of Contents
contents.zh-CHS: 目录

contents.text: 1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, it describes managed objects for the Next Hop Resolution Protocol (NHRP) as defined in RFC 2332 [17].
contents.zh-CHS: 此备忘录定义了管理信息库（MIB）的一部分，用于Internet社区中的网络管理协议。特别是，它描述了RFC 2332[17]中定义的下一跳解析协议（NHRP）的托管对象。

contents.text: The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in RFC 2119 [21].
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件中的关键词“必须”、“不得”、“要求”、“应”、“不应”、“应”、“不应”、“建议”、“可”和“可选”应按照RFC 2119[21]中所述进行解释。

contents.text: 2. The SNMP Management Framework
contents.zh-CHS: 2. SNMP管理框架

contents.text: The SNMP Management Framework presently consists of five major components:
contents.zh-CHS: SNMP管理框架目前由五个主要组件组成：

contents.text: o An overall architecture, described in RFC 2571 [1].
contents.zh-CHS: o RFC 2571[1]中描述的总体架构。

contents.text: o Mechanisms for describing and naming objects and events for the purpose of management. The first version of this Structure of Management Information (SMI) is called SMIv1 and described in STD 16, RFC 1155 [2], STD 16, RFC 1212 [3] and RFC 1215 [4]. The second version, called SMIv2, is described in STD 58, RFC 2578 [5], STD 58, RFC 2579 [6] and STD 58, RFC 2580 [7].
contents.zh-CHS: o 为管理目的描述和命名对象和事件的机制。这种管理信息结构（SMI）的第一个版本称为SMIv1，并在STD 16、RFC 1155[2]、STD 16、RFC 1212[3]和RFC 1215[4]中进行了描述。第二个版本称为SMIv2，在STD 58、RFC 2578[5]、STD 58、RFC 2579[6]和STD 58、RFC 2580[7]中进行了描述。

contents.text: o Message protocols for transferring management information. The first version of the SNMP message protocol is called SNMPv1 and described in STD 15, RFC 1157 [8]. A second version of the SNMP message protocol, which is not an Internet standards track protocol, is called SNMPv2c and described in RFC 1901 [9] and RFC 1906 [10]. The third version of the message protocol is called SNMPv3 and described in RFC 1906 [10], RFC 2572 [11] and RFC 2574 [12].
contents.zh-CHS: o 用于传输管理信息的消息协议。SNMP消息协议的第一个版本称为SNMPv1，在STD 15、RFC 1157[8]中进行了描述。SNMP消息协议的第二个版本不是互联网标准跟踪协议，称为SNMPv2c，在RFC 1901[9]和RFC 1906[10]中进行了描述。消息协议的第三个版本称为SNMPv3，在RFC 1906[10]、RFC 2572[11]和RFC 2574[12]中进行了描述。

contents.text: o Protocol operations for accessing management information. The first set of protocol operations and associated PDU formats is described in STD 15, RFC 1157 [8]. A second set of protocol operations and associated PDU formats is described in RFC 1905 [13].
contents.zh-CHS: o 访问管理信息的协议操作。STD 15、RFC 1157[8]中描述了第一组协议操作和相关PDU格式。RFC 1905[13]中描述了第二组协议操作和相关PDU格式。

contents.text: o A set of fundamental applications described in RFC 2573 [14] and the view-based access control mechanism described in RFC 2575 [15].
contents.zh-CHS: o RFC 2573[14]中描述的一组基本应用程序和RFC 2575[15]中描述的基于视图的访问控制机制。

contents.text: A more detailed introduction to the current SNMP Management Framework can be found in RFC 2570 [16].
contents.zh-CHS: 有关当前SNMP管理框架的更详细介绍，请参见RFC 2570[16]。

contents.text: Managed objects are accessed via a virtual information store, termed the Management Information Base or MIB. Objects in the MIB are defined using the mechanisms defined in the SMI.
contents.zh-CHS: 托管对象通过虚拟信息存储（称为管理信息库或MIB）进行访问。MIB中的对象是使用SMI中定义的机制定义的。

contents.text: This memo specifies a MIB module that is compliant to the SMIv2. A MIB conforming to the SMIv1 can be produced through the appropriate translations. The resulting translated MIB must be semantically equivalent, except where objects or events are omitted because no translation is possible (use of Counter64). Some machine readable information in SMIv2 will be converted into textual descriptions in SMIv1 during the translation process. However, this loss of machine readable information is not considered to change the semantics of the MIB.
contents.zh-CHS: 此备忘录指定了符合SMIv2的MIB模块。通过适当的翻译，可以生成符合SMIv1的MIB。生成的已翻译MIB必须在语义上等效，除非由于无法翻译而省略了对象或事件（使用计数器64）。在翻译过程中，SMIv2中的一些机器可读信息将转换为SMIv1中的文本描述。但是，这种机器可读信息的丢失不被认为会改变MIB的语义。

contents.text: 3. Structure of the MIB
contents.zh-CHS: 3. MIB的结构

contents.text: The NHRP MIB contains three groups: the General Group, the Client Group, and the Server Group.
contents.zh-CHS: NHRP MIB包含三个组：常规组、客户机组和服务器组。

contents.text: 3.1. The NHRP General Group
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1. NHRP通用组

contents.text: The General Group contains objects that apply to both clients and servers -- in particular the nhrpNextIndex scalar object, the NHRP Cache Table and the NHRP Purge Request Table.
contents.zh-CHS: 常规组包含同时应用于客户端和服务器的对象——特别是nhrpNextIndex标量对象、NHRP缓存表和NHRP清除请求表。

contents.text: The nhrpNextIndex scalar object is used to provide unique indices for the nhprClientIndex in the nhrpClientTable and the nhrpServerIndex in the nhrpServerTable. If used consistently, this object may prevent conflicts when multiple managers attempt to create rows simultaneously in the same table.
contents.zh-CHS: nhrpNextIndex标量对象用于为nhrpClientTable中的nhprClientIndex和nhrpServerTable中的nhrpServerIndex提供唯一索引。如果一致使用，当多个管理器试图在同一个表中同时创建行时，此对象可能会防止冲突。

contents.text: 3.1.1. The NHRP Cache Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.1. NHRP缓存表

contents.text: The NHRP Cache Table represents the internetwork layer address to NBMA address cache that is maintained by both NHRP clients and NHRP servers.
contents.zh-CHS: NHRP缓存表表示由NHRP客户端和NHRP服务器维护的网络层地址到NBMA地址缓存。

contents.text: The NHRP Cache Table contains an ifIndex as part of the Index Clause. This ifIndex represents the use of a generic ifIndex, such that the value of this ifIndex SHOULD reflect a specific NBMA subnetwork related interface as determined by an implementation. For example, assuming that the NBMA subnetwork is ATM, then it is up to the implementors of this MIB to determine their own ATM interface layering (assuming compliance with the IF-MIB, RFC 2233 [18] and the ATM-MIB, RFC 2515 [19]). In other words, assuming that the NBMA subnetwork is ATM, the ifIndex in the NHRP Cache Table would represent the ifIndex containing or consisting of the VC (or shortcut) denoted by this Table entry.
contents.zh-CHS: NHRP缓存表包含一个ifIndex作为Index子句的一部分。此ifIndex表示通用ifIndex的使用，因此此ifIndex的值应反映由实现确定的特定NBMA子网相关接口。例如，假设NBMA子网为ATM，则由该MIB的实施者确定其自身的ATM接口分层（假设符合IF-MIB、RFC 2233[18]和ATM-MIB、RFC 2515[19]）。换句话说，假设NBMA子网是ATM，NHRP缓存表中的ifIndex将表示包含或由该表项表示的VC（或快捷方式）组成的ifIndex。

contents.text: The indexing scheme for the NHRP Cache Table is very similar to the MPC Ingress Cache Table and the MPS Ingress Cache Table in the
contents.zh-CHS: NHRP缓存表的索引方案与中的MPC入口缓存表和MPS入口缓存表非常相似

contents.text: Multiprotocol Over ATM (MPOA) MIB [23]. This MIB and the MPOA MIB were designed to be complementary and non-overlapping. The MPOA MIB should also support this MIB. The MPOA MIB was designed prior to this MIB, and was designed by the LANE/MPOA Working Group in the ATM FORUM. The indexing scheme of the NHRP Cache Table (and the NHRP Server Cache Table) reflect the indexing scheme of the MPC Ingress Cache Table and the MPS Ingress Cache Table. Although, other indexing schemes could have been used for the NHRP Cache Table, a consistent indexing scheme between these tables was thought to be more advantageous from an implementation standpoint.
contents.zh-CHS: ATM上的多协议（MPOA）MIB[23]。该MIB和MPOA MIB设计为互补且不重叠。MPOA MIB也应支持此MIB。MPOA MIB是在此MIB之前设计的，由LANE/MPOA工作组在ATM论坛上设计。NHRP缓存表（和NHRP服务器缓存表）的索引方案反映了MPC入口缓存表和MPS入口缓存表的索引方案。尽管NHRP缓存表可以使用其他索引方案，但从实现的角度来看，这些表之间的一致索引方案被认为更为有利。

contents.text: 3.1.2. The NHRP Purge Request Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1.2. NHRP清除请求表

contents.text: The NHRP Purge Request Table is a way to track Purge Request Information.
contents.zh-CHS: NHRP清除请求表是跟踪清除请求信息的一种方法。

contents.text: 3.2. The NHRP Client Group
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2. NHRP客户群

contents.text: The Client Group contains objects that only apply to NHRP clients (NHCs).
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端组包含仅适用于NHRP客户端（NHC）的对象。

contents.text: 3.2.1. The NHRP Client Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2.1. NHRP客户机表

contents.text: The NHRP Client Table contains entries for NHRP Next Hop Clients (NHCs) associated with this agent. Each row in the table represents a single NHC. The RequestID used in Registration requests needs to be saved to non-volatile storage. Depending upon the implementation,
contents.zh-CHS: NHRP客户端表包含与此代理关联的NHRP下一跳客户端（NHC）的条目。表中的每一行代表一个NHC。注册请求中使用的RequestID需要保存到非易失性存储器中。视实施情况而定，

contents.text: this may or may not impact how the StorageType is used. For a complete description of how the Registration RequestID is used, see Section 5.2.3 of [17].
contents.zh-CHS: 这可能会也可能不会影响StorageType的使用方式。有关如何使用注册请求ID的完整说明，请参见[17]第5.2.3节。

contents.text: 3.2.2. The NHRP Client Registration Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2.2. NHRP客户端注册表

contents.text: The NHRP Client Registration Table contains information on registration requests which need to be maintained by the Clients. Each entry in this table represents a single registration request. Note: since the NHRP specification does not mandate a refresh algorithm, this table omits refresh information, however, this table does contain information for all the registration requests which need to be maintained by the NHRP Clients.
contents.zh-CHS: NHRP客户端注册表包含客户端需要维护的注册请求信息。此表中的每个条目表示一个注册请求。注意：由于NHRP规范不要求使用刷新算法，因此此表省略了刷新信息，但是，此表确实包含需要由NHRP客户端维护的所有注册请求的信息。

contents.text: 3.2.3. The NHRP Client NHS Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2.3. NHRP客户端NHS表

contents.text: The NHRP Client NHS Table contains the NBMA subnetwork addresses of servers configured for use by the client. By default, the agent will add an entry to this table which corresponds to the client's default router.
contents.zh-CHS: NHRP客户端NHS表包含配置供客户端使用的服务器的NBMA子网地址。默认情况下，代理将向该表添加一个条目，该条目对应于客户端的默认路由器。

contents.text: 3.2.4. The NHRP Client Statistics Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2.4. NHRP客户端统计表

contents.text: The NHRP Client Statistics Table contains NHRP statistics maintained by a client. These statistics include counters on requests and replies, as well as counters for errors which are encountered by the Clients.
contents.zh-CHS: NHRP客户端统计表包含由客户端维护的NHRP统计信息。这些统计信息包括请求和答复的计数器，以及客户端遇到的错误的计数器。

contents.text: 3.3. The NHRP Server Group
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3. NHRP服务器组

contents.text: The Server Group contains objects that only apply to NHRP servers (NHSes).
contents.zh-CHS: 服务器组包含仅适用于NHRP服务器（NHSE）的对象。

contents.text: 3.3.1. The NHRP Server Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.1. NHRP服务器表

contents.text: The NHRP Server Table contains entries for each server associated with this agent.
contents.zh-CHS: NHRP服务器表包含与此代理关联的每个服务器的条目。

contents.text: 3.3.2. The NHRP Server Cache Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.2. NHRP服务器缓存表

contents.text: The NHRP Server Cache Table contains additional objects that a server keeps for each entry in its cache. This table extends the NHRP Cache Table defined in the General Group.
contents.zh-CHS: NHRP服务器缓存表包含服务器为其缓存中的每个条目保留的附加对象。此表扩展了在常规组中定义的NHRP缓存表。

contents.text: 3.3.3. The NHRP Server NHC Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.3. NHRP服务器NHC表

contents.text: This table contains information about all the Clients known to the Servers.
contents.zh-CHS: 此表包含有关服务器已知的所有客户端的信息。

contents.text: 3.3.4. The NHRP Server Statistics Table
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3.4. NHRP服务器统计表

contents.text: The NHRP Server Statistics Table contains NHRP statistics maintained by a server. These statistics include counters on requests and replies, as well as counters for errors which are encountered by the Servers.
contents.zh-CHS: NHRP服务器统计表包含由服务器维护的NHRP统计信息。这些统计信息包括请求和答复的计数器，以及服务器遇到的错误的计数器。

contents.text: 4. NBMA Next Hop Resolution Protocol MIB Definitions
contents.zh-CHS: 4. NBMA下一跳解析协议MIB定义

contents.text: NHRP-MIB DEFINITIONS ::= BEGIN
IMPORTS
contents.zh-CHS: 进口

contents.text: OBJECT-TYPE, MODULE-IDENTITY, mib-2, Integer32, Counter32, Unsigned32 FROM SNMPv2-SMI MODULE-COMPLIANCE, OBJECT-GROUP FROM SNMPv2-CONF TEXTUAL-CONVENTION, TruthValue, RowStatus, StorageType, TimeStamp FROM SNMPv2-TC ifIndex FROM IF-MIB AddressFamilyNumbers FROM IANA-ADDRESS-FAMILY-NUMBERS-MIB ;
contents.zh-CHS: 对象类型、模块标识、mib-2、整数32、计数器32、来自SNMPv2 SMI模块的未签名32、来自SNMPv2 CONF text-CONVENTION的对象组、TruthValue、RowStatus、StorageType、来自SNMPv2 TC的时间戳、来自IF-mib的ifIndex、来自IANA-ADDRESS-FAMILY-NUMBERS-mib的家庭编号；

contents.text: nhrpMIB MODULE-IDENTITY LAST-UPDATED "9908260000Z" -- August 26, 1999 ORGANIZATION "Internetworking Over NBMA (ion) Working Group" CONTACT-INFO "Maria Greene (maria@xedia.com) Contractor
contents.zh-CHS: nhrpMIB模块标识最后更新“990826000Z”-1999年8月26日组织“NBMA（离子）工作组互联”联系方式“Maria Greene(maria@xedia.com)承包人

contents.zh-CHS: 琼·库奇亚拉(joan@ironbridgenetworks.com)铁桥网络

contents.text: James V. Luciani (luciani@baynetworks.com) Bay Networks"
contents.zh-CHS: 詹姆斯诉卢西亚尼(luciani@baynetworks.com)海湾网络”

contents.text: DESCRIPTION "This MIB contains managed object definitions for the Next Hop Resolution Procol, NHRP, as defined in RFC 2332 [17]."
contents.zh-CHS: DESCRIPTION“此MIB包含RFC 2332[17]中定义的下一跳解析过程NHRP的托管对象定义。”

contents.text: -- revision history
contents.zh-CHS: --修订历史

contents.text: REVISION "9908260000Z" -- August 26, 1999 DESCRIPTION "Initial version, published as RFC 2677."
contents.zh-CHS: 修订版“990826000Z”-1999年8月26日描述“初始版本，作为RFC 2677出版。”

contents.text:
NhrpGenAddr ::= TEXTUAL-CONVENTION
    STATUS      current
    DESCRIPTION
        "The value of an internetwork layer or NBMA address."
    SYNTAX      OCTET STRING (SIZE (0..64))
nhrpObjects OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= { nhrpMIB 1 }
nhrpGeneralObjects OBJECT IDENTIFIER ::= { nhrpObjects 1 }

--
--  The following scalar is to be used to
--  provided indices for the
--  nhrpClientTable, and/or the nhrpServerTable.
--

nhrpNextIndex OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX Unsigned32 MAX-ACCESS read-only STATUS current DESCRIPTION "This scalar is used for creating rows in the nhrpClientTable and the nhrpServerTable. The value of this variable is a currently unused value for nhrpClientIndex and nhrpServerIndex.
contents.zh-CHS: nhrpNextIndex对象类型语法Unsigned32 MAX-ACCESS只读状态当前描述“此标量用于在nhrpClientTable和nhrpServerTable中创建行。此变量的值是nhrpClientIndex和nhrpServerIndex当前未使用的值。

contents.text: The value returned when reading this variable must be unique for the NHC's and NHS's indices associated with this row. Subsequent attempts to read this variable must return different values.
contents.zh-CHS: 读取此变量时返回的值对于与此行关联的NHC和NHS索引必须是唯一的。后续读取此变量的尝试必须返回不同的值。

contents.text: NOTE: this object exists in the General Group because it is to be used in establishing rows in the nhrpClientTable and the nhrpServerTable. In other words, the value retrieved from this object could become the value of nhrpClientIndex and nhprServerIndex.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：此对象存在于常规组中，因为它用于在nhrpClientTable和nhrpServerTable中建立行。换句话说，从该对象检索到的值可以成为nhrpClientIndex和nhprServerIndex的值。

contents.text: In the situation of an agent re-initialization the value of this object must be saved in non-volatile storage.
contents.zh-CHS: 在代理重新初始化的情况下，此对象的值必须保存在非易失性存储器中。

contents.text: -- -- The NHRP Cache Table --
contents.zh-CHS: ----NHRP缓存表--

contents.text: nhrpCacheTable OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX SEQUENCE OF NhrpCacheEntry MAX-ACCESS not-accessible STATUS current
contents.zh-CHS: NhrpCacheEntry MAX-ACCESS的nhrpCacheTable对象类型语法序列不可访问状态当前

contents.text:
DESCRIPTION
    "This table contains mappings between internetwork layer
    addresses and NBMA subnetwork layer addresses."
::= { nhrpGeneralObjects 2 }

nhrpCacheEntry OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX NhrpCacheEntry MAX-ACCESS not-accessible STATUS current DESCRIPTION "A cached mapping between an internetwork layer address and an NBMA address. Entries can be created by the network administrator using the nhrpCacheRowStatus column, or they may be added dynamically based on protocol operation (including NHRP, SCSP, and others, such as ATMARP).
contents.zh-CHS: nhrpCacheEntry对象类型语法nhrpCacheEntry MAX-ACCESS不可访问状态当前描述“Internet层地址和NBMA地址之间的缓存映射。网络管理员可以使用nhrpCacheRowStatus列创建条目，也可以根据协议操作动态添加条目（包括NHRP、SCSP和其他，如ATMARP）。

contents.text: When created based by NHRP protocol operations this entry is largely based on contents contained in the Client Information Entry (CIE).
contents.zh-CHS: 当根据NHRP协议操作创建时，此条目主要基于客户端信息条目（CIE）中包含的内容。

contents.text:
Zero or more Client Information Entries (CIEs) may be
    included in the NHRP Packet. For a complete description
    of the CIE, refer to Section 5.2.0.1 of
    RFC 2332 [17]."
INDEX       {
                nhrpCacheInternetworkAddrType,
                nhrpCacheInternetworkAddr,
                ifIndex,
                nhrpCacheIndex
            }
::= { nhrpCacheTable 1 }

NhrpCacheEntry ::= SEQUENCE {
    nhrpCacheInternetworkAddrType    AddressFamilyNumbers,
    nhrpCacheInternetworkAddr        NhrpGenAddr,
    nhrpCacheIndex                   Unsigned32,
    nhrpCachePrefixLength            Integer32,
    nhrpCacheNextHopInternetworkAddr NhrpGenAddr,
    nhrpCacheNbmaAddrType            AddressFamilyNumbers,
    nhrpCacheNbmaAddr                NhrpGenAddr,
    nhrpCacheNbmaSubaddr             NhrpGenAddr,
    nhrpCacheType                    INTEGER,
    nhrpCacheState                   INTEGER,
    nhrpCacheHoldingTimeValid        TruthValue,
    nhrpCacheHoldingTime             Unsigned32,
    nhrpCacheNegotiatedMtu           Integer32,
    nhrpCachePreference              Integer32,
    nhrpCacheStorageType             StorageType,
    nhrpCacheRowStatus               RowStatus

nhrpCacheInternetworkAddrType OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX      AddressFamilyNumbers
    MAX-ACCESS  not-accessible
    STATUS      current
    DESCRIPTION
        "The internetwork layer address type of this Next Hop
        Resolution Cache entry. The value of this object indicates
        how to interpret the values of nhrpCacheInternetworkAddr
        and nhrpCacheNextHopInternetworkAddr."
    ::= { nhrpCacheEntry 1 }
nhrpCacheInternetworkAddr OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX NhrpGenAddr MAX-ACCESS not-accessible STATUS current

nhrpCacheType OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX      INTEGER {
                    other(1),
                    register(2),
                    resolveAuthoritative(3),
                    resoveNonauthoritative(4),

                }
    MAX-ACCESS  read-create

        "An indication of how this cache entry

'other(1)' The entry was added by some other means.
contents.zh-CHS: “其他（1）”该条目是通过其他方式添加的。

contents.text: 'register(2)' In a server, added based on a client registration.
contents.zh-CHS: 服务器中的“注册（2）”，基于客户端注册添加。

contents.text: 'resolveAuthoritative(3)' In a client, added based on receiving an Authoritative NHRP Resolution Reply.
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端中的“ResolveAuthority（3）”，基于收到权威NHRP解决方案回复而添加。

contents.text: 'resolveNonauthoritative(4)' In a client, added based on receiving a Nonauthoritative NHRP Resolution Reply.
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端中的“ResolveNonAuthoritive（4）”，基于收到非授权NHRP解决方案回复而添加。

contents.text: 'transit(5)' In a transit server, added by examining a forwarded NHRP packet.
contents.zh-CHS: 传输服务器中的“传输（5）”，通过检查转发的NHRP数据包添加。

contents.text: 'administrativelyAdded(6)' In a client or server, manually added by the administrator. The StorageType of this entry is reflected in 'nhrpCacheStorageType'.
contents.zh-CHS: 在客户端或服务器中添加“AdministrativeAdded（6）”，由管理员手动添加。此条目的StorageType反映在“nhrpCacheStorageType”中。

contents.text: 'atmarp(7)' The entry was added due to an ATMARP.
contents.zh-CHS: “atmarp（7）”由于atmarp而添加的条目。

contents.text: 'scsp(8)' The entry was added due to SCSP.
contents.zh-CHS: “scsp（8）”由于scsp而添加的条目。

contents.text: When the entry is under creation using the nhrpCacheRowStatus column, the only value that can be specified by the administrator is 'administrativelyAdded'. Attempting to set any other value will cause an 'inconsistentValue' error.
contents.zh-CHS: 当使用nhrpCacheRowStatus列创建条目时，管理员可以指定的唯一值是“AdministrativeAdded”。尝试设置任何其他值将导致“值不一致”错误。

contents.text:
The value cannot be modified once the entry is active."

"An indication of the state of this entry. The values are:
contents.zh-CHS: “此条目状态的指示。值为：

contents.text: 'incomplete(1)' The client has sent a NHRP Resolution Request but has not yet received the NHRP Resolution Reply.
contents.zh-CHS: “不完整（1）”客户已发送NHRP解决请求，但尚未收到NHRP解决回复。

contents.text: 'ackReply(2)' For a client or server, this is a cached valid mapping.
contents.zh-CHS: “ackReply（2）”对于客户端或服务器，这是缓存的有效映射。

contents.text: nhrpCacheHoldingTimeValid OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX TruthValue MAX-ACCESS read-only STATUS current DESCRIPTION "True(1) is returned if the value of 'nhrpCacheType' is not 'administrativelyAdded'. Since the value of 'nhrpCacheType' was not configured by a user, the value of 'nhrpCacheHoldingTime' is considered valid. In other words, the value of 'nhrpCacheHoldingTime' represents the Holding Time for the cache Entry.
contents.zh-CHS: nhrpCacheHoldingTimeValid对象类型语法TruthValue MAX-ACCESS只读状态当前描述“True（1）如果“nhrpCacheType”的值不是“AdministrativeAdded”，则返回。由于“nhrpCacheType”的值不是由用户配置的，因此“nhrpCacheHoldingTime”的值被视为有效。换句话说，“nhrpCacheHoldingTime”的值表示缓存项的保留时间。

contents.text:
If 'nhrpCacheType has been configured by a
    user, (i.e. the value of 'nhrpCacheType' is
    'administrativelyAdded') then false(2) will be returned.
    This indicates that the value of
    'nhrpCacheHoldingTime' is undefined because this row
    could possibly be backed up in nonvolatile storage."
::= { nhrpCacheEntry 11 }

nhrpCacheHoldingTime OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX Unsigned32(0..65535) UNITS "seconds" MAX-ACCESS read-only STATUS current DESCRIPTION "If the value of 'nhrpCacheHoldingTimeValid is true(1) then this object represents the number of seconds that the cache entry will remain in this table. When this value reaches 0 (zero) the row should be deleted.
contents.zh-CHS: nhrpCacheHoldingTime对象类型语法Unsigned32（0..65535）单位“秒”最大访问只读状态当前描述“如果'nhrpCacheHoldingTimeValid'的值为真（1），则此对象表示缓存项将保留在此表中的秒数。当此值达到0（零）时，应删除该行。

contents.zh-CHS: nhrpClientRequestID对象类型语法Unsigned32 MAX-ACCESS read create STATUS current DESCRIPTION“用于向其服务器注册此客户端的请求ID。根据NHRP规范第5.2.3节，RFC 2332[17]，请求ID必须保存在非易失性存储器中，这样，如果NHC崩溃并重新初始化，它将使用不同的

nhrpServerTable OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX      SEQUENCE OF NhrpServerEntry
    MAX-ACCESS  not-accessible
    STATUS      current
    DESCRIPTION
        "This table contains information for a set of NHSes
        associated with this agent."
    ::= { nhrpServerObjects 1 }

nhrpServerEntry OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX      NhrpServerEntry
    MAX-ACCESS  not-accessible
    STATUS      current
    DESCRIPTION
        "Information about a single NHS."
    INDEX       { nhrpServerIndex }
    ::= { nhrpServerTable 1 }

NhrpServerEntry ::= SEQUENCE {
    nhrpServerIndex                 Unsigned32,
    nhrpServerInternetworkAddrType  AddressFamilyNumbers,
    nhrpServerInternetworkAddr      NhrpGenAddr,
    nhrpServerNbmaAddrType          AddressFamilyNumbers,
    nhrpServerNbmaAddr              NhrpGenAddr,
    nhrpServerNbmaSubaddr           NhrpGenAddr,
    nhrpServerStorageType           StorageType,
    nhrpServerRowStatus             RowStatus
}

nhrpServerIndex OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX      Unsigned32 (1..4294967295)
    MAX-ACCESS  not-accessible
    STATUS      current
    DESCRIPTION
        "An identifier for the server that is unique within the
        scope of this agent."
    ::= { nhrpServerEntry 1 }

nhrpServerInternetworkAddrType OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX      AddressFamilyNumbers
    MAX-ACCESS  read-create
    STATUS      current
    DESCRIPTION
        "The type of the internetwork layer address of this
        server. This object is used to interpret the value of
        nhrpServerInternetworkAddr."
    ::= { nhrpServerEntry 2 }

    MAX-ACCESS  read-create
    STATUS      current

    ::= { nhrpServerEntry 3 }

nhrpServerNbmaAddrType OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX      AddressFamilyNumbers
    MAX-ACCESS  read-create
    STATUS      current
    DESCRIPTION
        "The type of the NBMA subnetwork address of this server.
        This object is used to interpret the value of
        nhrpServerNbmaAddr."
    ::= { nhrpServerEntry 4 }

    SYNTAX      NhrpGenAddr
    MAX-ACCESS  read-create
    STATUS      current
    DESCRIPTION

    SYNTAX      NhrpGenAddr
    MAX-ACCESS  read-create
    STATUS      current

    ::= { nhrpServerEntry 6 }

nhrpServerStorageType OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX      StorageType
    MAX-ACCESS  read-create
    STATUS      current
    DESCRIPTION
        "This object defines whether this row is kept in
        volatile storage and lost upon a Server crash or
        reboot situation, or if this row is backed up by
        nonvolatile or permanent storage."

    ::= { nhrpServerEntry 7 }

nhrpServerRowStatus OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX      RowStatus
    MAX-ACCESS  read-create

    DESCRIPTION

    ::= { nhrpServerEntry 8 }

-- -- The Server Cache Table -- nhrpServerCacheTable OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX SEQUENCE OF NhrpServerCacheEntry MAX-ACCESS not-accessible STATUS current DESCRIPTION "This table extends the nhrpCacheTable for NHSes. If the nhrpCacheTable has a row added due to an NHS or based on information regarding an NHS then a row is also added in this table.
contents.zh-CHS: ----服务器缓存表--nhrpServerCacheTable对象类型语法序列NhrpServerCacheEntry MAX-ACCESS不可访问状态当前描述“此表扩展NHSE的nhrpCacheTable。如果nhrpCacheTable由于NHS或基于有关NHS的信息而添加了一行，则此表中也会添加一行。

contents.text:
The rows in this table will be created when rows in
    the nhrpCacheTable are created.  However, there may
    be rows created in the nhrpCacheTable which do not
    have corresponding rows in this table.  For example,
    if the nhrpCacheTable has a row added due to a Next
    Hop Client which is co-resident on the same device
    as the NHS, a row will not be added to this table."
::= { nhrpServerObjects 2 }

contents.zh-CHS: nhrpServerNhcTable NhrpServerNhcEntry MAX-ACCESS的对象类型语法序列不可访问状态当前

contents.text:
DESCRIPTION
    "A table of NHCs that are available for use by this NHS
    (Server)."
REFERENCE
    "Section 4 Configuration (Next Hop Servers),
    RFC 2332 [17]."
::= { nhrpServerObjects 3 }

nhrpServerNhcEntry OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX      NhrpServerNhcEntry
    MAX-ACCESS  not-accessible
    STATUS      current
    DESCRIPTION
        "An NHC that may be used by an NHS."
    INDEX       { nhrpServerIndex, nhrpServerNhcIndex }
    ::= { nhrpServerNhcTable 1 }

NhrpServerNhcEntry ::= SEQUENCE {
    nhrpServerNhcIndex                  Unsigned32,
    nhrpServerNhcPrefixLength           Integer32,
    nhrpServerNhcInternetworkAddrType   AddressFamilyNumbers,
    nhrpServerNhcInternetworkAddr       NhrpGenAddr,
    nhrpServerNhcNbmaAddrType           AddressFamilyNumbers,
    nhrpServerNhcNbmaAddr               NhrpGenAddr,
    nhrpServerNhcNbmaSubaddr            NhrpGenAddr,
    nhrpServerNhcInUse                  TruthValue,
    nhrpServerNhcRowStatus              RowStatus
}

nhrpServerNhcIndex OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX      Unsigned32 (1..4294967295)
    MAX-ACCESS  not-accessible
    STATUS      current
    DESCRIPTION
        "An identifier for an NHC available to an NHS."
    ::= { nhrpServerNhcEntry 1 }

nhrpServerNhcPrefixLength OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX      Integer32 (0..255)
    MAX-ACCESS  read-create
    STATUS      current
    DESCRIPTION
        "The number of bits that define the internetwork
        layer prefix associated with the
        nhrpServerNhcInternetworkAddr."
    ::= { nhrpServerNhcEntry 2 }

nhrpServerNhcInternetworkAddrType OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX      AddressFamilyNumbers
    MAX-ACCESS  read-create
    STATUS      current
    DESCRIPTION
        "The type of the internetwork layer address of the
        NHRP Client represented in this entry. This object
        indicates how the value of nhrpServerNhcInternetworkAddr
        is to be interpreted."
    ::= { nhrpServerNhcEntry 3 }

nhrpServerNhcInternetworkAddr OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX      NhrpGenAddr
    MAX-ACCESS  read-create
    STATUS      current
    DESCRIPTION
        "The value of the internetwork layer address of
        the NHRP Client represented by this entry.  If this
        value is not known, this will be a zero-length
        OCTET STRING."
    ::= { nhrpServerNhcEntry 4 }

nhrpServerNhcNbmaAddrType OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX      AddressFamilyNumbers
    MAX-ACCESS  read-create
    STATUS      current
    DESCRIPTION
        "The type of the NBMA subnetwork address of the NHRP
        Client represented by this entry. This object indicates
        how the values of nhrpServerNhcNbmaAddr and
        nhrpServerNhcNbmaSubaddr are to be interpreted."
    ::= { nhrpServerNhcEntry 5 }

nhrpServerNhcNbmaAddr OBJECT-TYPE
    SYNTAX      NhrpGenAddr
    MAX-ACCESS  read-create
    STATUS      current
    DESCRIPTION
        "The NBMA subnetwork address of the NHC. The type of the
        address is indicated by the corresponding value of
        nhrpServerNbmaAddrType."
    ::= { nhrpServerNhcEntry 6 }
nhrpServerNhcNbmaSubaddr OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX NhrpGenAddr MAX-ACCESS read-create STATUS current

        and forwarded (Fw).  Forwarded (Fw) would be done
        by a transit NHS."

contents.text: 5. IANA Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 5. IANA考虑

contents.text: The Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) has been and continues to be responsible for maintaining the ADDRESS FAMILY NUMBERS (http://www.isi.edu/in-notes/iana/assignments/address-family-numbers) name space assignments. The IANA has placed this list in a MIB module, such that it may be imported into other MIBs. The motivation for doing this is to allow MIBs to not have to change when a new assignment is made to the ADDRESS FAMILY NUMBERS. This is very similar to the motivation behind the IANAifType-MIB.
contents.zh-CHS: 互联网分配号码管理局（IANA）一直并将继续负责维护地址系列号码(http://www.isi.edu/in-notes/iana/assignments/address-family-numbers)名称空间分配。IANA已将此列表放置在MIB模块中，以便可以将其导入其他MIB。这样做的动机是允许MIB在对地址族编号进行新分配时不必更改。这与IANAifType MIB背后的动机非常相似。

contents.text: Any additions or changes to the list of ADDRESS FAMILY NUMBERS registered via IANA will be done as they have in the past and this document does not propose any changes to the ADDRESS FAMILY NUMBERS other than to place them into a MIB, which can be found via anonymous FTP at: ftp://ftp.isi.edu/mib/ianaaddressfamilynumbers.mib.
contents.zh-CHS: 对通过IANA注册的地址系列号列表的任何添加或更改将与过去一样进行，本文件不建议对地址系列号进行任何更改，只是将其放入MIB中，可通过匿名FTP在以下位置找到：ftp://ftp.isi.edu/mib/ianaaddressfamilynumbers.mib.

contents.text: 6. Security
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 安全

contents.text: There are a number of management objects defined in this MIB that have a MAX-ACCESS clause of read-write and/or read-create. Such objects may be considered sensitive or vulnerable in some network environments. The support for SET operations in a non-secure environment without proper protection can have a negative effect on network operations.
contents.zh-CHS: 此MIB中定义了许多管理对象，它们的MAX-ACCESS子句为read-write和/或read-create。在某些网络环境中，此类对象可能被视为敏感或易受攻击。在没有适当保护的非安全环境中支持SET操作可能会对网络操作产生负面影响。

contents.text: The NHRP Protocol, RFC 2332 [17], Section 5.2.4.4 discusses security. There is an authentication option which should be utilized to authenticate the source and also provide data integrity to the NHRP payload. This MIB does not contain any managed objects which configure or expose security information such as that needed for NHRP authentication or data integrity.
contents.zh-CHS: NHRP协议RFC 2332[17]第5.2.4.4节讨论了安全性。有一个身份验证选项，该选项应用于对源进行身份验证，并为NHRP有效负载提供数据完整性。此MIB不包含任何配置或公开安全信息（如NHRP身份验证或数据完整性所需的信息）的托管对象。

contents.text: The following items were deemed to jeopardize security and thus, were NOT added to this MIB. Items denoted as (configurable) are those which would need values. Items denoted as (read-only) are those which would provide information. Although the NHRP Protocol [17], requires or has this information, exposing it in a MIB would jeopardize the entire NBMA domain where NHRP was being used. Therefore, these items have been omitted from the MIB.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下项目被视为危害安全，因此未添加到此MIB中。表示为（可配置）的项目是那些需要值的项目。表示为（只读）的项目是提供信息的项目。尽管NHRP协议[17]要求或拥有该信息，但将其暴露在MIB中会危及使用NHRP的整个NBMA域。因此，MIB中省略了这些项目。

contents.text: 1. (configurable) enable/disable security 2. (configurable) SPI (security parameter index). Depending upon the implementation, there may be multiple SPIs, and these would be configurable also. For example, if the implementation switched to a different SPI after a given time. 3. (configurable) algorithm. The HMAC-MD5-128 is the default hash algorithm. 4. (configurable) lifetime value in seconds. 5. (read-only) key. 6. (read-only) list of users who have access to the above information.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. （可配置）启用/禁用安全2。（可配置）SPI（安全参数索引）。根据实现的不同，可能会有多个SPI，并且这些SPI也是可配置的。例如，如果实现在给定时间后切换到不同的SPI。3.（可配置）算法。HMAC-MD5-128是默认的哈希算法。4.（可配置）以秒为单位的生存期值。5.（只读）键。6.（只读）有权访问上述信息的用户列表。
